note.p: Scottish surgeon. MD, Edinburgh, 1847. Fellow, Royal College of Surgeons of Edinburgh, 1854. Lectured on forensic medicine, Royal College of Surgeons, Edinburgh, 1856–97. Surgeon of police for Edinburgh, from 1854. Medical officer of health, Edinburgh, from 1862. Professor of forensic medicine and public health, Edinburgh University, from 1897. Knighted 1895.
